UI Team
Capabilities

The UI Team's mission is to efficiently deliver innovative, reliable, and purpose-driven technology through cutting edge development practices, rapid and cumulative learning, and collaboration with the organization.

We believe in:

  • Knowing and understanding our clients' businesses in the context of emerging technologies
  • Making the easy things easy and the hard things possible through platform and marketplace competencies
  • Cultivating a culture of continuous learning, curiosity, and improvement
  • Adopting emerging technologies in a manner that is both forward thinking and sustainable
  • The prolific sharing of knowledge in the form of code, blog posts, presentations, and projects
